Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Name.name: Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Name
Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Name.description: Cursor theme name. Used only by Xservers that support the Xcursor extension.

Gtk_Cursor_Blink_Timeout.name: Gtk_Cursor_Blink_Timeout
Gtk_Cursor_Blink_Timeout.description: Time after which the cursor stops blinking, in seconds.

Gtk_Key_Theme_Name.name: Gtk_Key_Theme_Name
Gtk_Key_Theme_Name.description: Basename of the default keybinding theme used by gtk+.

Cursor_Blink_Time.name: Cursor_Blink_Time
Cursor_Blink_Time.description: Length of the cursor blink cycle, in milliseconds.

Enable_Event_Sounds.name: Enable_Event_Sounds
Enable_Event_Sounds.description: Whether to play any event sounds at all.

Gtk_Theme_Name.name: Gtk_Theme_Name
Gtk_Theme_Name.description: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

Double_Click_Time.name: Double_Click_Time
Double_Click_Time.description: Maximum time allowed between two clicks for them to be considered a double click (in milliseconds).

Icon_Theme_Name.name: Icon_Theme_Name
Icon_Theme_Name.description: Icon theme to use for the panel, nautilus etc.

Dnd_Drag_Threshold.name: Dnd_Drag_Threshold
Dnd_Drag_Threshold.description: A palette of named colors for use in themes.

Double_Click_Distance.name: Double_Click_Distance
Double_Click_Distance.description: Maximum distance allowed between two clicks for them to be considered a double click (in pixels).

Theme_Name.name: Theme_Name
Theme_Name.description: Theme to use for gtk+ and qt.

Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Size.name: Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Size
Gtk_Cursor_Theme_Size.description: Timeout in milliseconds before a click starts repeating (onspinner buttons for example).

Icon_Theme_Fallback.name: Icon_Theme_Fallback
Icon_Theme_Fallback.description: Name of a icon theme to fall back to.

Xft_Rgba.name: Xft_Rgba
Xft_Rgba.description: Type of subpixel antialiasing; none, rgb, bgr, vrgb, vbgr.

Gtk_Recent_Files_Enabled.name: Gtk_Recent_Files_Enabled
Gtk_Recent_Files_Enabled.description: Whether GTK+ should keep track of items inside the recently used resources list.

Individual_Scaling.name: Individual_Scaling
Individual_Scaling.description: Semicolon-separated list of name=value pairs, as used in QT_SCREEN_SCALE_FACTORS.

Xft_Dpi.name: Xft_Dpi
Xft_Dpi.description: Resolution for Xft, in 1024 * dots/inch. -1 to use default value. Do not modify it manually.

Enable_Input_Feedback_Sounds.name: Enable_Input_Feedback_Sounds
Enable_Input_Feedback_Sounds.description: Whether to play event sounds as feedback to user input.

Xft_Hintstyle.name: Xft_Hintstyle
Xft_Hintstyle.description: What degree of hinting to use; hintnone, hintslight, hintmedium, or hintfull.

Gtk_Recent_Files_Max_Age.name: Gtk_Recent_Files_Max_Age
Gtk_Recent_Files_Max_Age.description: The maximum age, in days, of the items inside the recently used resources list. Items older than this setting will be excised from the list. If set to 0, the list will always be empty; if set to -1, no item will be removed.

Gtk_Font_Name.name: Gtk_Font_Name
Gtk_Font_Name.description: Name of the default font used by gtk+.
